function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in public transport usage due to COVID-19 fear and restrictions","Impact":"Reduction in public transport revenue and accessibility. Increase in private transportation usage.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures and promote public transport safety. Provide incentives for public transport usage.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, air filtration systems, real-time occupancy monitoring","People":"Public transport users, city inhabitants","Owner":"Public transport authorities, city government"},{"Description":"Switch from stationary work and learning to e-learning and online work","Impact":"Reduction in public transport demand and increase in online services usage.","Mitigation":"Improve internet infrastructure, provide remote work and e-learning support, and encourage flexible work arrangements.","Technologies":"Fiber-optic internet, video conferencing platforms, cloud-based collaboration tools","People":"Employees, students","Owner":"Employers, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Fear of coronavirus infection leading to limited mobility and social lives","Impact":"Decline in public transport usage, reduced social interaction, and decreased economic activity.","Mitigation":"Public health awareness campaigns, vaccination rollouts, and strict hygiene protocols.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, vaccination tracking systems, hygiene monitoring devices","People":"Citizens, public transport users, community members","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government"}]}
